item.description:
Welcome all new members!

As this is our first meeting, we can use this time to get to know each other and figure out how to structure future meetings. Depending on who shows up, we may divide up into different pace and distance groups. In your RSVP, specify what your preference is for distance and road versus trail. Also, I am open to either Saturday or Sunday, morning or afternoon. The date and time listed below are tentative.

Let's meet at the southwest entrance of East Rock park in New Haven. (Corner of Cold Spring and Livingston). Bring your running shoes, and a friend!
item.name: New Haven Runners Inaugural Meetup
